body.p: Mr Tomlinson request me to ask you to take the petition you have had signed by his neighbors down to Governor Magoffin in in the morning I have written him a letter & sent a petition signed by all the Jury. I have no doubt he will pardon him. It will certainly be done if you go down & you can bring the pardon up with you & have it entered Monday Please attend to it it is very important & have it done soon
